## Role & Contributions

Led the steering committee's Secondary Data Workgroup and an internal team of three to identify, collect, harmonize, analyze, and visualize 85+ secondary data indicators for Wake County's 2025 Community Health Needs Assessment.

![Summary sheet from the 2025 Wake County CHNA with primary and secondary data.](images/summary-sheet.png)

## Tools Used

-   R

-   Quarto

-   Canva
